item.title: Seamec Secures USD 16.72 Million Vessel Charter Agreement with G R Infraprojects
item.description: Top News Seamec Secures USD 16.72 Million Vessel Charter Agreement with G R Infraprojects 6 minutes ago Seamec Limited has officially announced a USD 16.72 million subcontract agreement with G R Infraprojects Limited for charter hire of vessel 'Seamec III' over 150 days. The contract involves subsea installation and diving operations for ONGC's pipeline replacement projects, representing a significant business development in the company's normal course of operations.

item.title: Vivimed Labs Limited Trading Suspension Revoked by BSE and NSE, Trading to Resume December 18
item.description: Vivimed Labs Limited Trading Suspension Revoked by BSE and NSE, Trading to Resume December 18 24 minutes ago Vivimed Labs Limited announces that BSE and NSE have officially revoked the trading suspension for its equity shares, effective December 18, 2025. The company successfully addressed previous SEBI (LODR) Regulations non-compliances and will resume trading in Trade for Trade category under T group. This development reinstates liquidity and price discovery for shareholders after the compliance period.

item.title: TVS Supply Chain Solutions: Additional ₹120 Crore Worth Shares Pledged to Debenture Trustee
item.description: TVS Supply Chain Solutions: Additional ₹120 Crore Worth Shares Pledged to Debenture Trustee 3 hours ago TVS Supply Chain Solutions has pledged an additional 5 crore equity shares worth approximately ₹120 crores to Catalyst Trusteeship Limited as debenture trustee on December 8, 2025. Combined with an earlier pledge of 7 crore shares in April 2025, the total pledged shares now stand at 6.05 crore, representing 13.71% of the company's total share capital. The pledge serves as security for debenture holders including major financial institutions like J.P. Morgan Securities, Nomura Capital, and Kotak Private Credit Fund among others.

item.title: Vidya Wires Limited Lists at ₹52.13 on BSE, Trades Above Issue Price
item.description: Vidya Wires Limited Lists at ₹52.13 on BSE, Trades Above Issue Price 16 hours ago Vidya Wires Limited debuted on BSE at ₹52.13 per share, trading above its IPO issue price of ₹52.00. The listing reflects a modest premium of ₹0.13, representing approximately 0.25% gains over the offer price. The successful market debut enables regular trading of the company's shares on the exchange.
